p: Some of the key facilitators and barriers identified by the stakeholders taking part in the pilot, through a short post-LF pilot survey and subsequent telephone conference, are presented in TableÂ 4. The evaluation highlighted that previous training in the methodology and experience of systematic review methods were key facilitators. Moreover, that use of the online systematic review software and global time zones was an effective way of optimizing resources. The barriers identified also highlights the need to ensure that everyone is familiar with all the systems used, and in identifying sufficient resources at the outset of the outbreak, tailored to the type of outbreak and number of articles identified after the initial search.
